name: Autoscript
description:
A challenging puzzle game about arranging symbols to match patterns. Discover the rules by experimenting, then carefully build a convoluted contraption to achieve your goal. Mouse control only.
Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 49.

Inspired by "Gestalt_OS" by Stephen Lavelle and Lucas Le Slo

Sounds:

 - Hand Bells by InspectorJ of Freesound.org
 - Wind by IgnasD of OpenGameArt.org
